K12D0770_H0710:37a-24: 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:37a-25: de ltar sha ta pushpa dang /
K12D0770_H0710:37b-3: du ru ska la sogs pa de rnams re re
K12D0770_H0710:37b-4: 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na dong tse stong phrag
K12D0770_H0710:37b-7: 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:37b-8: nye'u ji ltar 'tshong pa nyos la chu bo'i gzhung
K12D0770_H0710:37b-9: la lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs
K12D0770_H0710:37b-10: nas kha shar du bltas te sbyin sreg brgya byas
K12D0770_H0710:37b-11: na sum 'gyur gyi dong tse rnyed par 'gyur ro
K12D0770_H0710:37b-12: // ras bal gyi sa bon la mar dang /
K12D0770_H0710:37b-13: sbrang rtsis byugs nas stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas
K12D0770_H0710:37b-14: na nyi ma bdun gyi bar la ras gcig rnyed
K12D0770_H0710:37b-15: par 'gyur ro // rtag tu bzlas na gos dang /
K12D0770_H0710:37b-17: 'bum bzlas na dong tse lnga stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:37b-18: 'bum tsho gnyis bzlas na grong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:37b-19: 'bum tsho gsum bzlas na longs spyod chen po rnyed
K12D0770_H0710:37b-20: par 'gyur zhing grong brgyad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro
K12D0770_H0710:37b-21: // be'u'i lci ba la sbyin sreg stong byas na ba glang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:37b-23: dud 'gro rnams kyi lus la zho dang /
K12D0770_H0710:37b-24: sbrang rtsis sbags la nyin re bzhin sbyin sreg byas
K12D0770_H0710:37b-25: na ra lug la sogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro
K12D0770_H0710:37b-26: // ba lang gi lhas kyi nang du ku sha'i me tog mar dang /
K12D0770_H0710:37b-27: sbrang rtsis sbags la nyin re bzhin sbyin sreg byas na 'byung po dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38a-2: rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38a-3: ji ltar 'dod pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38a-4: yang ba lang gi lhas kyi nang du 'o ma dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38a-5: 'o thug za zhing shri ri pa la'i yam shing
K12D0770_H0710:38a-6: la sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gang 'dod pa'i gsol
K12D0770_H0710:38a-7: ba btab pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38a-8: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas la zla ba'am /
K12D0770_H0710:38a-9: nyi ma gzas gzung ba la ldong ros dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38a-10: gi wang srang lngas aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bzhi la
K12D0770_H0710:38a-11: g-yas skor g-yon skor du bzhag nas yang 'dab ma
K12D0770_H0710:38a-12: bzhis g-yogs la ji srid dro bar gyur pa de
K12D0770_H0710:38a-15: 'bar bas 'di ltar sa bla sa 'og sa steng gsum 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38a-16: ba lang gi lhas kyi nang ngam /
K12D0770_H0710:38a-17: chu bo 'dus par bsod snyoms za ba'am /
K12D0770_H0710:38a-18: 'o thug za bas aarga'i 'o thug mar dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38a-19: sbrang rtsis byugs nas stong tsho lnga sbyin sreg byas
K12D0770_H0710:38a-20: na rang nyid kyis nor gyi bdag po nor bu
K12D0770_H0710:38a-21: bzang po nor gyi bdag po nor dang bcas pa
K12D0770_H0710:38a-23: nga mgu'o zhes de smra na mchog brgyad gang 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur ro; ;rgyal po dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38a-27: thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38b-3: lus srul po rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38b-4: dran pa tsam gyis mdun du 'dug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38b-5: rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i sems can shi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38b-8: sa 'og gi 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'jig pa dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38b-12: rjes su bzung ba brgyad po 'di rnams las de'i mdun du gang na gang gcig blang bar bya'o //
K12D0770_H0710:38b-13: des gang ci 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38b-15: sbrang rtsis byugs nas 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na padma r'a ka'i nor bu rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38b-16: de ltar autpa la sngon po dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38b-17: ku mu da rnams dri zhim po dang ldan pas
K12D0770_H0710:38b-18: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i nor bu rin po che
K12D0770_H0710:38b-20: yungs kar dkar po mar dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38b-21: sbrang rtsis byugs la gang gi ming nas bzung nas
K12D0770_H0710:38b-22: sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du
K12D0770_H0710:38b-23: 'gyur ro // til nag po la mar dang /
K12D0770_H0710:38b-24: sbrang rtsis sbags la 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na nor nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0770_H0710:38b-25: aarga'i shing la me btang la stong phrag brgyad du
K12D0770_H0710:38b-26: sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun gyis nad zhi
K12D0770_H0710:38b-27: bar 'gyur ro // dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas sha ta pushpa dang /
K12D0770_H0710:39a-4: gu gul rnams ji ltar 'tshong ba nyos la mchod pa byas nas mar dang /
K12D0770_H0710:39a-5: sbrang rtsis sngags la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg
K12D0770_H0710:39a-6: byas na nyi ma bdun na bdun 'gyur gyi nor
K12D0770_H0710:39a-8: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas na bdag dang /
K12D0770_H0710:39a-9: gzhan nye bar 'gyur bar byed do //
K12D0770_H0710:39a-11: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0770_H0710:39a-12: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12D0770_H0710:39a-13: mah'a yaksha se na pa ta ye /
K12D0770_H0710:39a-14: ki ni ki ni gha tta ka rna sva ba nam me dha ra sa ma ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0770_H0710:39a-15: aarga'i mar khus ku mu da'i me tog sbyin sreg
K12D0770_H0710:39a-16: byas na rmi lam yang dag pa ji lta ba
K12D0770_H0710:39a-18: ki ni ki ni gan da karna tsi tram me dha ra y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0770_H0710:39a-19: don nges par ster na cho ga ji ltar brjod pa bzhin no //
K12D0770_H0710:39a-20: 'phags pa gnod gnas kyi dbang po ji ltar 'byung ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
K12D0770_H0710:39a-21: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang /
